00028 using namespace std;

00043 class ParseXML {
00044 public:
00046     ParseXML() {}
00048     ~ParseXML() {}
00049 
00058     void Open(const string &_filename);
00059 
00068     template<typename T>
00069     void NextHandler(T *object, void (T::*fkt)(const string &, map<string, string> &));
00070 
00074     void IgnoreChilds();
00075     
00076 private:
00077     // virtual void ParseRoot(const string &el, map<string, string> &attr);
00078     void ParseIgnore(const string &el, map<string, string> &attr);
00079 
00080     
00082     void StartElemHndl(const string &el, map<string, string> &attr);
00084     void EndElemHndl(const string &el);
00085 
00086 
00087     class Functor {
00088     public:
00089         Functor() {}
00090         virtual void operator()(const string &, map<string, string> &) = 0;
00091     };
00092 
00093     template<typename T>
00094     class FunctorMember : public Functor {
00095     public:
00096         typedef void (T::*fkt_t)(const string &, map<string, string> &);
00097 
00098         FunctorMember(T* cls, fkt_t fkt) : _cls(cls), _fkt(fkt) {}
00099         
00100         void operator()(const string &el, map<string, string> & attr) {
00101             (_cls->*_fkt)(el, attr);
00102         }
00103         
00104     private:
00105         T* _cls;
00106         fkt_t _fkt;
00107     };
00108 
00109     stack<Functor *> _stack_handler;
00110     Functor *_handler;
00111 
00112     friend void start_hndl(void *data, const char *el, const char **attr);
00113     friend void end_hndl(void *data, const char *el);
00114 };
00115 
00116 inline void ParseXML::IgnoreChilds()
00117 {
00118     NextHandler(this, &ParseXML::ParseIgnore);
00119 }
00120 
00121 template<typename T>
00122 inline void ParseXML::NextHandler(T *object, void (T::*fkt)(const string &, map<string, string> &))
00123 {
00124     _handler = dynamic_cast<Functor*>(new FunctorMember<T>(object, fkt));
00125     _stack_handler.push(_handler);
00126 }
00127 
00128 }}
